Class StudentAttendanceStatusCenterPanel

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.gui.StudentAttendanceStatusCenterPanel
public class StudentAttendanceStatusCenterPanel extends Object
A UI component that displays the attendance status for a student. It shows subject-specific attendance cards and allows selection highlighting.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static List<String>
    allSubjects
    List of all subjects for the student.
    private static javafx.scene.layout.VBox

    Container holding all subject attendance cards.
    private static javafx.scene.layout.HBox
    selectedCard
    The currently selected attendance card (highlighted).
    private static final String
    SUBJECT_ICON
    The icon image URL used for subjects.

  • Method Details

    • createPanel

      public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane createPanel(int studentId)
      Creates and returns a pane containing the attendance status panel for the given student. The panel shows subject cards with attendance information and allows interaction.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student whose attendance status is displayed
      Returns:
      a Pane representing the student attendance status UI

    • buildHeader

      private static javafx.scene.layout.Pane buildHeader()
      Builds the header section of the attendance status panel. This header includes a background with shadow effect and a title.
      Returns:
      a Pane containing the styled header UI components

    • updateCards

      private static void updateCards(int studentId)
      Updates the attendance subject cards displayed in the panel by clearing existing cards and loading new data for the specified student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student whose attendance cards are to be updated

    • buildSubjectCard

      private static javafx.scene.layout.HBox buildSubjectCard(String subject, int studentId)
      Builds a collapsible subject card UI component displaying attendance statistics for the given student and subject. The card expands and collapses on click to show or hide detailed information.
      Parameters:
      subject - the name of the subject to display
      studentId - the ID of the student whose attendance stats will be shown
      Returns:
      an HBox representing the subject card with attendance details

    • setCardExpanded

      private static void setCardExpanded(javafx.scene.layout.HBox card)
      Expands the given subject card by making its detailed summary visible and animating the card's height and fade-in effect.
      Parameters:
      card - the HBox representing the subject card to expand

    • setCardCollapsed

      private static void setCardCollapsed(javafx.scene.layout.HBox card)
      Collapses the given subject card by hiding its detailed summary and animating the card's height and fade-out effect.
      Parameters:
      card - the HBox representing the subject card to collapse
